channel.title: Erm can anyone tell me pickup commands PLEAse

item.title: Erm can anyone tell me pickup commands PLEAse
item.dc:creator: @Danny068 Danny068
item.description:
@Danny068 wrote:

Right first of all open in your server file there should be a notepad icon called client, ope nit by double clicking it. Press Ctrl+F to open a find toolbar. Type in pickup and keep pressing ‘Find next’ until it comes to highlighted pickup in a code like this

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Danny") || playerRights >= 2)) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(8,11)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12)); if (newItemID <= 11999 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("No such item."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup 0995 10"); }
Look at the code and where it says playerRights >= 2)) this means that admins can use this command, change the number to a different number for letting different people to use the command.

1 = Mod
2 = Admin
3 = Owner

Or where it says “Danny” change the Danny to your name. Hope this helps, if not pm me!

Read full topic
